testcase.name: Unstructured extracts text from a document and does not crash on other non-text items

failure.message: Unstructured extractor requires an optional dependency. Install it with pip install "biblicus[unstructured]".

testcase.failure: Failing step: And I build a "unstructured" extraction run in corpus "corpus" ... failed in 0.005s Location: features/integration_unstructured_extraction.feature:10 ASSERT FAILED: Unstructured extractor requires an optional dependency. Install it with pip install "biblicus[unstructured]".
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Unstructured extracts text from a document and does not crash on other non-text items When I download a mixed corpus into "corpus" ... passed in 1.889s And I build a "unstructured" extraction run in corpus "corpus" ... failed in 0.005s Then the extracted text for the item tagged "docx-sample" is not empty in the latest extraction run ... skipped in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
